lev.gui

Class LLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • lev.gui.LComponent
          • lev.gui.LLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class LLabel
extends LComponent
    A customized JLabel that is used by Leviathan for GUIs.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
